basics.summary: Hi everyone! I am a Management Information Systems student in the Shidler College of Business. I plan to graduate in Spring 2023

courses: ICS211 Intro to Computer Science II

work.summary: Assisting IT Specialists configure and troubleshoot Windows 10 OS, computer hardware, network, and printers

Terminating ethernet cables to provide internet connectivity to clients in Digital Media lab

Updated archival spreadsheet with metadata of 300+ documents
Provided front-desk reception services for Law students, faculty, and staff

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
